\documentclass{article}

\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}

% The margins can be set using the package geometry
\usepackage[top=5cm,right=5cm,bottom=5cm,left=5cm]{geometry}

% The package layout helps us to visualize the layout of the document
\usepackage{layout}

% Paddings can be fine-tuned using the schema generated by the package layout.
% The variable names are visible under the schema and can be redefined.
% The following line redefine the width of the margin for notes.
\setlength{\marginparwidth}{10cm}

\begin{document}

\layout
	
\end{document}
